hints.content:
This square is split into $2$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{halves}$, with $1$ piece shaded.  

![A square has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded gold.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/74d84e6ad273d2cf98f2d38aac50abc4ab589cd6)

The square has **one half** of the shape shaded.

This square is not split into equal-sized pieces.

![A square has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 unequal parts. The larger part is shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3fc4279d3d885dd3dce9e179f17cd904e160b88d)

These squares are split into $2$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{halves}$, with $2$ piece shaded.  

![A square has 1 diagonal line from opposite corners dividing it into 2 equal parts. Two parts are shaded pink.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/750c38314dc3917351b00ce4bb8499fba7030299)
![A square has 1 vertical line dividing it into 2 equal parts. Two parts are shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/da4b2d756b1cf58f563a5493d6c9abd62b104fbe)

These squares have **two halves** of the shape shaded.

These squares have **two halves** of the shape shaded:

![A square has 1 diagonal line from opposite corners dividing it into 2 equal parts. Two parts are shaded pink.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/750c38314dc3917351b00ce4bb8499fba7030299)
![A square has 1 vertical line dividing it into 2 equal parts. Two parts are shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/da4b2d756b1cf58f563a5493d6c9abd62b104fbe)

question.content:
**Which squares show two halves of the shape shaded?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 2]]

choices.content: ![A square has 1 diagonal line from opposite corners dividing it into 2 equal parts. Two parts are shaded pink.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/750c38314dc3917351b00ce4bb8499fba7030299)
![A square has 1 vertical line dividing it into 2 equal parts. Two parts are shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/da4b2d756b1cf58f563a5493d6c9abd62b104fbe)
![A square has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded gold.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/74d84e6ad273d2cf98f2d38aac50abc4ab589cd6)
![A square has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 unequal parts. The larger part is shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3fc4279d3d885dd3dce9e179f17cd904e160b88d)
